creator: Codek Apps
descriptionHtml:
Share files from one to other device without any internet connection or any cable with Share It android app. Transfer data of any size and of any format to all platforms no matter if you are offline or online. You can share videos, audio, photos, files with nearby friends. The most interesting and strong point of Share It is that you can transfer files separately and also in the shape of the bucket for example: audio, video, image, document, Apps, etc at once.
Sharing data was never simple before but now it is so easy. Transfer free app providing a quick and easy way to transfer data to your friends. Share It is a superlative and totally free of cost app for you to transfer all files, so share files without data cost. Share files provide secure sharing of mobile content or data transfer from phone to phone or from one or more of your family and friends. Now you can copy the data & perform free data transfer from phone to phone via the best android transfer app we offer our users to share all types of sharing without any WIFI from one phone to another phone so this app is totally Offline.
Share It offers appropriate offline sharing methods so that you can share files with someone nearby. You can either: Send and select files then share, Invite others to join, Generate a personalized QR code for others to scan, simply send files to those nearby. You will also be able to see the History of your sanded or received data.

Fabulous Features:
✔ transfer data with no cost.
✔ No internet required just select files and share.
✔ Transferring and Sharing any type of file with no size limitation.
✔ Support all Android devices.
✔ Data transfer history and received files can be easily found and managed.
✔ Support multiple sharing at one time.
✔ No cable or USB required.
✔ Fast speed of Sharing.
✔ Separate and bucket File sharing.
✔ Share Files Offline and transfer data anywhere and anytime.
✔ Keeps Sharing process working even when the screen is closed/locked.
✔ Data transfer with one or more devices at a time.
✔ Supports access to files after the receiver.
✔ Resume Interrupted Transfers.
✔ Beautiful design and easy use.

Permissions Required:
The following permissions are required to ensure that the app functions properly:
* Storage:
Allow Share It to access your phone storage to share files photos, videos, documents, and media files, etc.
* Location:
Need location to find nearby devices to which you want to transfer data.
* Wi-Fi:
To connect devices you need to open the Wi-Fi (just turn on the Wi-Fi icon while there is no Wi-Fi connection).
* Bluetooth:
Due to the limitation of the android system, Bluetooth could help to establish an improved connection.

Instructions:
Please ensure that both devices have installed the Share It file transfer app, then share files.

Connection methods:
1. Select files to send direct and then find other devices.
2. Invite a friend by sharing the app link or scan the QR code on other devices.

How to use:
* For Direct Send
Open the files transfer app,
Click the Send button,
Select Separate or multiple files,
Click the Share button,
now wait for the app to find the nearby devices,
choose your device and files will start to transfer.
* By Inviting friend
Click the Invite button
Share the app link with friend,
your friend will install the ShareIt app,
then both run the application and start sharing files.
* By Scanning QR Code
If your friend wants to receive files by scanning the code, then Click the QR bar code and scan it on another device and start to share data.
Enjoy this easiest Data transfer app anywhere, so start sharing your files now.

You can either: Send and select files then share, Invite others to join, Generate a personalized QR code for others to scan, simply send files to those nearby. You will also be able to see the History of your sanded or received data.

Fabulous Features:
✔ transfer data with no cost.
✔ No internet required just select files and share.
✔ Transferring and Sharing any type of file with no size limitation.
✔ Support all Android devices.
✔ Data transfer history and received files can be easily found and managed.
✔ Support multiple sharing at one time.
✔ No cable or USB required.
✔ Fast speed of Sharing.
✔ Separate and bucket File sharing.
✔ Share Files Offline and transfer data anywhere and anytime.
✔ Keeps Sharing process working even when the screen is closed/locked.
✔ Data transfer with one or more devices at a time.
✔ Supports access to files after the receiver.
✔ Resume Interrupted Transfers.
✔ Beautiful design and easy use.

Permissions Required:
The following permissions are required to ensure that the app functions properly:
* Storage:
Allow Share It to access your phone storage to share files photos, videos, documents, and media files, etc.
* Location:
Need location to find nearby devices to which you want to transfer data.
* Wi-Fi:
To connect devices you need to open the Wi-Fi (just turn on the Wi-Fi icon while there is no Wi-Fi connection).
* Bluetooth:
Due to the limitation of the android system, Bluetooth could help to establish an improved connection.

Instructions:
Please ensure that both devices have installed the Share It file transfer app, then share files.

Connection methods:
1. Select files to send direct and then find other devices.
2. Invite a friend by sharing the app link or scan the QR code on other devices.

How to use:
* For Direct Send
Open the files transfer app,
Click the Send button,
Select Separate or multiple files,
Click the Share button,
now wait for the app to find the nearby devices,
choose your device and files will start to transfer.
* By Inviting friend
Click the Invite button
Share the app link with friend,
your friend will install the ShareIt app,
then both run the application and start sharing files.
* By Scanning QR Code
If your friend wants to receive files by scanning the code, then Click the QR bar code and scan it on another device and start to share data.
Enjoy this easiest Data transfer app anywhere, so start sharing your files now.

You can share videos, audio, photos, files with nearby friends. The most interesting and strong point of Share It is that you can transfer files separately and also in the shape of the bucket for example: audio, video, image, document, Apps, etc at once.
Sharing data was never simple before but now it is so easy. Transfer free app providing a quick and easy way to transfer data to your friends. Share It is a superlative and totally free of cost app for you to transfer all files, so share files without data cost. Share files provide secure sharing of mobile content or data transfer from phone to phone or from one or more of your family and friends.
